input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Balsam Hill Green BH Balsam Fir Garland Set of 2'
  - Name='Sullivans 72" Artificial Gold Metallic Pine Christmas Garland'
  - Name='6ft. Pre-Lit Artificial White Birch Garland with 48 Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='Regency International 6' LED Silverado Garland'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 9' Mountain Pine Flocked Garland with LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Balsam Hill Green Balsam Fir Wreath'
  - Name='48'' in. Faux Pine Garland in Primrue'
  - Name='Faux Spruce Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 6' x 9" Pre-Lit Decorated Frosted Pine and Pine Cone Artificial Christmas'
  - Name='Vickerman 9' x 8" Unlit Canadian Pine Garland'
  - Name='108'' in. Lighted Faux Fir Garland'
  - Name='6FT Pre-lit Christmas Garland with Battery-Operated Timer Canora Grey'
  - Name='Canora Grey 2-Pack 6ft Pre-Lit Christmas Garland with 20 LED Lights'
  - Name='Everlasting Glow Glass Christmas Ornament Garland with Gold String Lights'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 9' Mountain Pine Flocked Garland'
  - Name='Set of 2 Lighted Faux Spruce Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Snowy Bristle Pine Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Regency International New Zealand Pine Garland'
  - Name='Sullivans Arborvitae Garland'
  - Name='Kurt Adler 9' Pre-Lit Flocked Incandescent Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Green BH Balsam Fir Garland Set of 2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar product type (pre-lit garland), different brand and fir variety; set of 2 might be longer or different configuration.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sullivans 72" Artificial Gold Metallic Pine Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland but with metallic gold coloring and likely different style and decorative focus; less similar in look and possibly materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6ft. Pre-Lit Artificial White Birch Garland with 48 Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland but made of white birch rather than pine; shorter length and fewer lights but similar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Regency International 6' LED Silverado Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland but likely different branch type and shorter length; differs in brand and possibly design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 9' Mountain Pine Flocked Garland with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length, pine garland with LED lights; flocked finish is a difference but core product usage is very close.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Green Balsam Fir Wreath
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wreath is a different shape and product type (circular decoration) compared to garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 48'' in. Faux Pine Garland in Primrue
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Faux pine garland but shorter length (4 feet) significantly less than 9 foot reference, possibly unlit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faux Spruce Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar artificial garland but with spruce, not pine; no mention of lights or length reduces similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6' x 9" Pre-Lit Decorated Frosted Pine and Pine Cone Artificial Christmas
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland with pine cones, but smaller size and frosted finish; largely similar function and decoration style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 9' x 8" Unlit Canadian Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and pine garland but unlit, which lowers similarity to pre-lit reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 108'' in. Lighted Faux Fir Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted artificial fir garland about 9 feet long, similar to reference in length and function but different brand and likely differences in branch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6FT Pre-lit Christmas Garland with Battery-Operated Timer Canora Grey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter pre-lit garland of unspecified pine type; battery-operated timer adds feature but 6 feet length and potential material differences lower score.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Canora Grey 2-Pack 6ft Pre-Lit Christmas Garland with 20 LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garlands shorter than reference, set of 2 instead of single 9ft, fewer LED lights; similar basic concept but differs in size and configuration.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlasting Glow Glass Christmas Ornament Garland with Gold String Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland of glass ornaments with string lights, more decorative and fragile, different silhouette and construction from pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 9' Mountain Pine Flocked Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as previous Fraser Hill Farm 9' Mountain Pine garland but unlit version lowers similarity to pre-lit reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Set of 2 Lighted Faux Spruce Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit faux spruce garland set, similar function but different branch type and set quantity; shorter total length possibly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Snowy Bristle Pine Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, pine garland with lights; snowy/bristle difference somewhat alters appearance but core features are similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Regency International New Zealand Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine garland from different brand, likely unlit and details unknown; lower similarity due to brand and probable differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sullivans Arborvitae Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different evergreen type (Arborvitae) and brand; likely different branch structure and possibly unlit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kurt Adler 9' Pre-Lit Flocked Incandescent Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and pre-lit garland, flocked finish and incandescent lights differ from battery-operated LEDs in reference but largely similar product category.
